xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/312227-2004 Sooner Football 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Relive the art of perfection with this collection of game highlights, interviews and locker room footage from the University of Oklahoma football team's unblemished 12-0 season in 2004, a year that saw the Sooners nab their third conference title in five years and take a stab at the national championships. Opponents include Texas Tech University, Oklahoma State University, Baylor University and the University of Oregon. 2004 Sooner Football
